name: I Can See the Forbidden Zone Rules
author: 拔丝地瓜
content: Two hundred years ago, the White Mist Forbidden Land suddenly appeared, and the world underwent a huge change. Monsters and supernatural beings with various strange powers appeared. The White Mist Forbidden Land is known as the Forbidden Zone for Life. Only one in ten thousand people who enter it survives.
